item.title: Put objects above 100KB to a Cache Service
item.description: Using the Google Apps Script Cache Service for objects/files above 100KB Snippet Run it Minimized version Snippet This code is a fork of pilbot/9d0567ef1daf556449fb and glade-at-gigwell/4e080771d685fbf1908edbd98eb2d88c See full code Leave a comment Create script from the snippet  *See how to use scrviz for clone Apps Script project index.js /** * The fork of * https://gist.github.com/pilbot/9d0567ef1daf556449fb, * https://gist.github.com/glade-at-gigwell/4e080771d685fbf1908edbd98eb2d88c */ /** * Using the Google Apps Script Cache Service for objects above 100Kb */ class ChunkyCache { /** * * @param {GoogleAppsScript.
